data.title: Stirnet
data.text: John Talbot, 10th Earl of Shrewsbury (d 08.02.1653-4) m1. Mary Fortescue (dau of Sir Francis Fortescue of Salden Hill) 1. George Talbot (dvpsp 07.03.1642) m. Mary Herbert (dau of Percy Herbert, 2nd Baron Powis) 2. Francis Talbot, 11th Earl of Shrewsbury, Earl of Waterford (d 16.03.1667) m1. Anne Conyers (dau of Sir William (not John) Conyers of Sockburne) A. Mary Talbot m. (08.07.1675) John Stonor of Watlington Park (b 22.03.1656, d 1689) m2. (10.01.1658-9) Anna Maria Brudenell (d 20.04.1702, dau of Robert Brudenell, 2nd Earl of Cardigan) B. Charles Talbot, 12th Earl of Shrewsbury, Duke of Shrewsbury, Lord Lieutenant of Ireland, Lord Treasurer of Great Britain, Lord Chamberlain (b 24.07.1660, dsps 01.02.1717-8) m. Adelhida (dau of Marquis of Palliotti) 3. Gilbert Talbot of Badge Court, upton Warren, Worcestershire (bur 11.04.1702 (not 28.09.1711)) Some details on Gilbert and his children come from a forum in soc.genealogy.medieval (as reported here), with thanks to a contributor (CV, 14.02.14) for bringing this to our attention. m. Jane Flatsburg (bur 09.11.1687) A. Gilbert Talbot, 13th Earl of Shrewsbury (b 11.01.1673, d unm 13.07.1743) B. George Talbot (b 1675, d 12.12.1733, 3rd son) m. (11.03.1718/9) Mary Fitzwilliam (d 20.09.1752, dau of Thomas, 4th Viscount Fitzwilliam) i. George Talbot, 14th Earl of Shrewsbury (b 11.12.1719, dsp 1787) m. (21.11.1753) Elizabeth Dormer (dau of John Dormer of Peterley, Lord Dormer) ii. Charles Talbot (b c1722, d 11.04.1766) m1. Mary Alwyn (dspm 08.06.1750, dau of Robert Alwyn of Trayford) m2. Mary Mostyn (dau of Sir John Mostyn, Bart of Talacre) a. Charles Talbot, 15th Earl of Shrewsbury (b 08.03.1753, dsp 06.04.1827) m. (23.09.1792) Elizabeth Hoey (d 13.02.1847, dau of James Hoey of Dublin) b. John Joseph Talbot of Grafton Hall (b 09.06.1765, d 08.08.1815) m1. (29.05.1789) Catherine Clifton (d 05.1791, dau of Thomas Clifton of Lytham) (1) Charles Talbot (dsp) (2) John Talbot, 16th Earl of Shrewsbury (b 18.03.1791, d 09.11.1852) m. (27.06.1814) Maria Theresa Talbot (d 04/08.06.1856, dau of William Talbot of Castle Talbot by Marie O'Toole) (A) John Talbot (b 27.11.1816, d 20.03.1817) (B) Mary Alathea Beatrix Talbot (d 18.12.1858) m. (04.04.1839) Philip Andrew, Prince Doria Pamphilj Landi (d 19.03.1876) (C) Gwendaline Catherine Talbot (d 27.10.1840) m. (11.05.1835) Mark Antony, Prince Borghese m2. (04.05.1797) (Susannah) Harriet Anne Bedingfield (d 07.06.1839, dau of Rev. Bacon Bedingfield of Ditchingham Hall) (3) George Henry Talbot (d 19.06.1839) m. (06.04.1829) Augusta Jones St. Paul (d 1841, dau of Sir Horace St. Paul, Bart) (A) John Talbot (b 18.02.1830, d 23.04.1846) (B) Augusta Talbot (d 03.07.1862) m. (22.07.1851) Edward George Fitzalan Howard, Lord Howard of Glossop (4) Harriet Talbot (d 09.10.1866) m. (13/19.10.1829) John W(illiam) Searle (d 1861) (5) Charlotte Talbot (b c1806, d 21.11.1843) m. (19.08.1830) Michael James Robert Dillon, 12th Earl of Roscommon (b 02.10.1798, dsps 15.05.1850) (6)+ other issue - James (d unm 02.07.1827), Susan Margaret c. Barbara Talbot m. (09.04.1780) Francis Fortescue Turville of Husband's Bosworth d. Juliana Talbot m. (07.06.1784) Michael Bryan (author) e. Theresa Talbot (d 01.01.1823) m. (05.02.1793) Robert Selby (son of Thomas of Biddleston) f.+ other issue - George Joseph (dsp 07.07.1789), Anne (d young), Frances (d 1820), Caroline Mary (b c1766, d 10.01.1782), Elizabeth, Anne Mary (d 1775), Charlotte Mary (d 1775) iii. Francis Talbot of Witham Place (b 1727, d 22.11.1813) m1. (20.04.1761) Anne Belasyse (dsp 13.09.1768, dau of Thomas Belasyse, 1st Earl of Fauconberg) m2. (18.05.1772) Margaret Frances Sheldon (dau of William Sheldon of Weston) a. Charles Thomas Talbot (b 24.11.1782, d 30.04.1838, Lt. Colonel) m. (01.02.1830) Julia Tichborne (d 04.06.1892, dau of Sir Henry Tichborne, 8th Bart) (1) Bertram Arthur Talbot, 17th Earl of Shrewsbury (b 11.12.1832, d unm 10.08.1856) (2) Annette Mary Talbot (d 01.07.1922) m. (17.01.1855) Sir Humhprey De Trafford, 2nd Bart (d 04.05.1886) (3) Gwendaline Elizabeth Talbot (d 03.09.1910) m. (29.10.1857) Edward Henry Petre of Whitley Abbey (d 21.11.1902) b. Maria Talbot (d 25.04.1814) m. (22.09.1802) James Wheble of Woodley Lodge c.+ other issue - Francis William (b 25.03.1781, dsp 06.1820), Elizabeth Margaret (d 16.10.1864), Louisa Frances (d 06.10.1864), Anna Barbara (d unm 1810) iv. Barbara Talbot (d 09.11.1759) m. (30.06.1742) James Aston, 5th Lord of Forfar (b 23.05.1723, d 24.08.1751) v. Mary Talbot (d 15.05.1753) m. (09.08.1759) Charles Dormer, 8th Lord (b 30.04.1725, d 30.03.1804) vi.+ other issue - John (d unm 05.07.1751), James (bur 02.1790, Bishop), Thomas (d 1775, Bishop), Lucy (d 06.1787, nun) C. Anne Talbot (b 25.12.1673, bur 07.05.1708) m. Edward Talbot of Albrighton 'of Hampstead' (yeoman) i. Anne Talbot m. (c1725) Henry Darnall of Poplar Hill, Maryland ii. Mary Talbot m. (c1740) Thomas Salvin of Easingwold iii.+ other issue - Apollonia (bpt 18.04.1706), Catharine (bpt 26.03.1707) D.+ other issue - Thomas (b c1674?, dsp bur 26.02.1678), Mary (b 1676, d 05.02.1717, nun) 4. Mary Talbot (bur 15.03.1710/1) m1. Charles Arundell (d Worcester 1649) m2. Mervyn Touchet, 4th Earl of Castlehaven (d 02.11.1686) m2. Frances (dau of Thomas, 1st Lord Arundel of Wardour) William Talbot of Whittington (d 27.03.1686) m. Mary Doughty (d 1661, dau of Thomas Doughty of Whittington) 1. William Talbot, Bishop of Durham (bpt 02.07.1658, d 10.10.1730) Wikipedia ("William Talbot (bishop)", 27.02.23), which identifies William's parents as William Talbot of Lichfield & Mary, dau of Thomas Stoughton of Whittington, reports that he was married twice, the 1st wife not being mentioned by BP1934. Neither mention a reported marriage to Agnes Hartopp (d 1730), @@ see here @@. m1. (sp) _ Crispe of Chipping Norton m2. Catherine King (d 23.11.1730, dau of Richard King of London) A. Charles Talbot, 1st Lord of Hensol (bpt 21.12.1685, d 14.02.1736-7, Lord Chancellor) m. (1709) Cecil Matthews (d 13.06.1720, dau of Charles Matthews of Castell-y-Menich) i. William Talbot, 2nd Lord of Hensol, 1st Lord Dinevor, Earl Talbot (b 16.05.1710, d 27.04.1782) m. (21.02.1733-4) Mary de Cardonnel (d 05.04.1787, dau of Adam de Cardonnel of Bedhampton Park) a. Cecil Talbot, later de Cardonnel, Baroness Dynevor or Dinevor (b 07.1735, d 14.03.1793) m. (16.08.1756) George Rice of Newton (d 03.08.1779) ii. John Talbot (d 22.09.1756) m1. (05.1737, sp) Henrietta Maria Decker (d 12.1747, dau of Sir Matthew Decker, Bart) m2. (08.1748) Catherine Chetwynd (dau of John Chetwynd, 2nd Viscount) a. John Chetwynd Talbot, later Chetwynd-Talbot, 3rd Lord of Hensol, 1st Earl Talbot (bpt 25.02.1749, d 19.05.1793) m. (07.05.1776) Charlotte Hill (b 18.03.1754, d 07/17.01.1804, dau of Wills Hill, 1st Marquess of Downshire) (1) Charles Chetwynd-Talbot, 2nd Earl Talbot (b 25.04.1777, d 16.01.1849) had issue m. (28.08.1800) Frances Thomasine Lambart (d 30.12.1819, dau of Charles Lambart of Beaupark) Their eldest surviving son, 3rd Earl Talbot, inherited the earldom of Shrewsbury also and became the 18th Earl of Shrewsbury. (2) John Chetwynd-Talbot (b 04.04.1779, d 08.02.1825) b. George Talbot (dsp, Rev.) m. Anne Beauclerk (dau of Lord Henry Beauclerk) c.+ other issue (d unm) - Charles (d 1804, Lt. Colonel), William Henry (d 1782, captain) iii. George Talbot (vicar of Guiting) m. (03.01.1761) Anne de Bouverie (dau of Jacob de Bouverie, 1st Viscount Folkestone) a. George Talbot of Temple Guiting (b 25.03.1763, d 07.04.1836) m. (04.01.1789) Charlotte Elizabeth Drake (d 1817, dau of Rev. Thomas Drake of Amesham) (1) Mary Anne Talbot (d 21.12.1878) m. (18.05.1815) Sir Francis Lawley, Bart of Middleton Hall (d 1851) (2) Charlotte Talbot m. (27.06.1818) William Mount of Wasing Place (d 10.04.1869) (3)+ other issue - Isabella (d 09.10.1869), Jane Elizabeth of Temple Guiting b. Charles Talbot, Dean of Salisbury (b 26.10.1769, d 28.02.1823) had issue m. (27.06.1796) Elizabeth Somerset (d 05.05.1836, dau of Henry Somerset, 5th Duke of Beaufort) (1) Frances Cecil Talbot (d 07.11.1855, 3rd dau) probably of this generation m. (31.12.1829) Philip Henry Abbot of Lincoln's Inn c. Cecil Talbot (d 24.02.1832) m. John Edmund Chamberlayne of Maugersbury (b 19.05.1766, dsp 02.1831) d. Louisa Talbot m. (13.06.1797) William Agar B. Edward Talbot (b 1693, d 09.12.1720, Archdeacon) C. Sherrington Talbot of Evesham, Worcestershire (b 1699, d 18.11.1766, Maj. General) m1. Elizabeth Medgett (dau of Henry Medgett) i. William Talbot (b 1718, dsp 02.03.1774, rector of St. Giles', Reading) ii. Sir Charles Henry Talbot of Belfast (co. Antrim) & Mickleham (Surrey), 1st Bart (b 30.10.1720, d 10.06.1798) m. (26.02.1749/50) Anne Hassel (d by 1810, dauheir of Thomas Hassel of St. Pancras) a. Sir Charles Talbot of Belfast & Mickleham, 2nd Bart (b 08.11.1798, d unm 03.11.1812) b. Sir George Talbot of Chart Park, 3rd Bart of Mickleham (b 14.03.1763, d 10.06.1850) m. (1787) Anna Preston (dau of Rev. Nathaniel (not Thomas) Preston of Swainston by Mary Hamilton) (1)+ issue - Mary Anne (b 10.04.1788), Charlotte Georgina c. Catherine Jane Talbot m. Rev. Josiah Labord d. Charlotte Mary Talbot m. George Horsley e.+ other issue - Amelia Anne, Anne Elizabeth m2. (sp) Eleanor Higford (dau of William Higford of Dixton) m3. Charlotte Freeman (dau of Thomas Freeman of Antigua) iii. Indiana Talbot m. (1774) Lewis Peake Garland of Michaelstow D. Henry Talbot of Dorking who married ... m. Katherine Clopton (dau of Sir Hugh Clopton of New Place, Stratford-on-Avon) E. Henrietta Maria Talbot m. Charles Trimnell, Bishop of Winchester F. Catherine Talbot m. Exton Sayer 2. Catherine Talbot m1. Walter Littleton of Lichfield
